el:protected.el:luamain:
-- GENERAL -- levelw = 20 levelh = 13 enigma.ConserveLevel=TRUE
-- LANDSCAPE -- create_world(levelw, levelh) fill_floor("fl-abyss",0,0,level_width,level_height) fill_floor("fl-space",1,2,level_width-2,level_height-4)
-- FLOORS -- fill_floor("fl-gray",2,4,3,3) fill_floor("fl-gray",6,2,3,3) fill_floor("fl-gray",5,7,3,3) fill_floor("fl-gray",10,5,3,3) fill_floor("fl-gray",14,7,3,3) fill_floor("fl-gray",15,3,3,3)
-- STONES -- draw_stones("st-blue-sand",{0,1},{1,0},20) draw_stones("st-blue-sand",{0,2},{0,1},10) draw_stones("st-blue-sand",{19,2},{0,1},10) draw_stones("st-death",{1,11},{1,0},18) draw_stones("st-blue-sand",{2,6},{2,0},2) draw_stones("st-blue-sand",{5,9},{2,0},2) draw_stones("st-blue-sand",{6,4},{2,0},2) draw_stones("st-blue-sand",{10,7},{2,0},2) draw_stones("st-blue-sand",{14,9},{2,0},2) draw_stones("st-blue-sand",{15,5},{2,0},2)
-- ITEMS -- set_item("it-document",11,6,{text="text1"})
-- OXYDS -- oxyd_default_flavor = "a" oxyd(3,6) oxyd(6,9) oxyd(7,4) oxyd(11,7) oxyd(15,9) oxyd(16,5) oxyd_shuffle()
-- FORCE -- enigma.AddConstantForce(0,25)
-- ACTOR -- set_actor("ac-blackball",11.5,2.5)
